definition: book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: He expatriated himself and lives in America.
sentences.chinese: 他放弃原国籍，现居美国。

sentences.english: No matter prize-winner nationality and sex.
sentences.chinese: 获奖者不论国籍和性别。

sentences.english: Peter: Many of these stars have joined foreign nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 很多明星都已经加入了外国籍了。

sentences.english: Ordained Buddhist monk aged 18 – 35 of all nationalities.
sentences.chinese: 不限国籍，年龄为18至35岁的佛教比丘。

sentences.english: Lady Speyer and the couple's children also lost their British nationality.
sentences.chinese: 施派尔夫人以及他们的孩子也都被失去了英国国籍。

sentences.english: Please write down your name, nationality, and passport number on this registration card.
sentences.chinese: 请把你的姓名，国籍，和护照号写在这张登记卡上。

sentences.english: People who are stateless often have no right to schooling or health care.
sentences.chinese: 无国籍的人往往没有教育或医疗保健的权利。

sentences.english: However, the following facts about Somali society suggestsome reality of statelessness.
sentences.chinese: 不管如何，以下事实揭示了一些无国籍的真相。

sentences.english: For non-permanent HKID customer, please provide Nationality proof.
sentences.chinese: 如非香港永久居民，请提供国籍证明。

sentences.english: The Referee and Judges of a kumite bout must not have the nationality of either of the participants.
sentences.chinese: 对打回合赛的主审和副审或与参赛者不可有相同国籍。

sentences.english: People who are approved to exit Chinese nationality and need to stay inChongqing;
sentences.chinese: 经批准退出中国国籍需要在渝停留的人员。

sentences.english: In 1997, he became an Australian citizen.
sentences.chinese: 1997年，胡士泰加入澳大利亚国籍。

sentences.english: Science and art belong to the whole world, and before them anish the barriers of nationality.
sentences.chinese: 科学与艺术属于全世界，国籍障碍在他们之前消失了。

sentences.english: The federal courts also have authority to naturalize persons as U. S. citizens and to settle certain legal disputes.
sentences.chinese: 联邦有权授予美国国籍及解决某类法律争端。

sentences.english: Like most Korean residents of Japan, he didn't have Japanese citizenship.
sentences.chinese: 就像大部分在日朝鲜人一样，郑大世没有日本国籍。

definition: to become naturalized/to become a citizen
permanent residency permit (originally referred specifically to the US green card)
ethnic Chinese/non-Chinese citizen of Chinese ancestry
